CEG (Cool Eco Game) is a web game that was made in 4 days by Vladyslav Kyrychenko (frontend), Jakub Slama (backend) and Ondřej Kondrčík.
The main goal of the game is to correct the environmental problems of the city - Tsukrovo.

This game was produced to spread general awareness about environmental protection and the use of renewable energy sources. It should teach users the basics of nature conservation in a fun way and educate them about the ongoing pollution of rivers, forests, meadows and primarily the climate.
